name: Workplace Accidents
description:
You thought the afterlife was an eternity of rest? Get back to work! 

Worker death won't prevent itself. Unless we somehow got fridges that don't cause workers to drop dead after a few uses and require a ghost to constantly fix, but now you're being unreasonable! 

How to play

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys, press Space to fix broken equipment before your workers die!

Who are we?

We're a small group of software developers and artists from Cardiff, UK. This isn't the first time we've attempted a game jam, but it is the first time we've submitted an entry!

Thanks for taking the time to play, and we hope you have fun!

How it's made

We made this entirely from scratch, using Unity as our engine, Aesprite for our artwork, SFXR, Ableton and our voices for sound.
